metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30689 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 14.6, iOS 14.6 and iPadOS 14.6, Safari 14.1.1, macOS Big Sur11.4, watchOS 7.5. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead touniversal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30689` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.3-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.3-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
